events.name: After Hours Cafe
events.description: ​​The After Hours Caféis a series for founders and operators to get their best work done around other incredible builders.​We were tired of coffee shops closing at 5pm, workspaces thinning out as the day ended, and not having a place to workandbe in community as founders.​​​​☕️More Details:​Enjoy ouropen desk, free-flowing workspace with both comfortable couches and high speed internet to get your work done atVerci Flatiron.​As the sun sets, use ourstunning rooftop for happy hour(or work), where drinks and city views create the perfect backdrop for conversations.​Drink a range of (free)specialty coffees, teas, and matchas crafted by expert baristas at the bar.​Whether you're wrapping up projects, sparking collaborations, or simply seeking a change of scenery, the space adapts to your needs - from quiet concentration corners to communal tables designed for conversation.​IMPORTANT:Please select a approximate arrival time so that we understand capacity limits for the space throughout the night.​🍵 The hosts for the night:​➡️ From two-person startups to public companies,Rhois the banking platform with everything businesses need to manage cash, control spend, and automate finance busywork. Rho offers corporate cards, banking, treasury, expense management,  AP, accounting automation, and more in one integrated platform backed by award-winning support.​Rho is a fintech company, not a bank. Checking and card services are provided by Webster Bank, N.A., member FDIC; savings account services are provided by American Deposit Management Co. and its partner banks.​Learn more about Rhohere.​➡️ Verci is a workspace and social space in NYC, meticulously curated for founders, artists, and creatives. Learn more atverci.comand read our manifesto atverci.com/manifesto.​➡️ Carry is a leading technology platform for tax savings, helping self-employed professionals and business owners keep more of what they earn through smarter tax strategies, tax-advantaged accounts, and expert-backed filing. For more information, visitcarry.com.

events.name: Founders' Fest: Verci Founders Pasta-Making Dinner w/ Google Cloud
events.description: ​Founders' Fest is an exclusive event that brings founders together to level up your startup with Google Cloud!  Join us for an curated pasta-making workshop with wine pairing that brings founders together to knead, create, and connect!Experience an unforgettable evening of culinary craftsmanship and wine, meaningful conversations with fellow founders, and enjoying a family-style pasta dinner in Verci's intimate Flatiron space.​Space is limited to ensure a personal, collaborative experience. Acceptance guarentees entrance.​Google Cloudis a suite of public cloud computing services offered by Google, providing a wide range of hosted solutions for computing, storage, AI/ML, big data analytics, networking, and application development that run on Google’s global infrastructure.​Verciis a community for founders, creatives, and operators based in Flatiron.

events.name: Verci Japan
events.description: ​MORE INFO HERE​We're running our next retreat in Japan from May 23rd until May 26th, with an optional week after until the 1st of June.​Deposits do NOT reflect the full price - the full price of part one of the retreat is $1,450. We'll be collecting the rest of payment at the end of March! Deposits just hold your spot for the retreat.​Deposits & Commitments end on March 25th.​Sign up and commit a deposit by grabbing a ticket on this luma page. Once approved, you'll be 100% good to go to attend - if you don't get approved for capacity reasons, you will not be charged.
